title: Last Week Crypto - DeFi is Going Ballistic! (World Headed to Rekt City!?)
description:
This is the sixth episode of a weekly cryptocurrency news series called Last Week Crypto.

We cover the latest global news stories affecting the cryptocurrency markets August 9th through August 15th of 2020.
